member.summary: Finds an image uri given its reference, or string.Empty if the reference was not valid.
member.returns: A uri pointing to the photo resource, or string.Empty if the reference was not valid.

member.name: T:EduLocate.Common.SimpleWebRequest
member.summary: Handles sending simple web requests and deserialising the response to a given type.

member.name: M:EduLocate.Common.SimpleWebRequest.GetResponseFromEndpointAsync``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Sends a GET request asynchronously.
member.typeparam: The type to deserialise the response to.
member.param: The uri to make the request to.
The parameters to add to the uri. The values are turned into strings via ToString before being encoded.
member.returns: The servers response, of type T.
